title: Multigenerational Planning and 'The Most Important Thing to Parents'
description: Valerie Newell, principal and senior wealth advisor of Mariner Wealth Advisors, describes how advisors should work with multigenerational families.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Valerie Newell, principal and senior wealth advisor of Mariner Wealth Advisors, describes how advisors should work with multigenerational families.
